alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:14PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Phillips County through 215 PM MDT... At 114 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Loring, or 22 miles west of Whitewater, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loring, Port Of Morgan and Chapman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips
